description: All blightbeasts are spawned based on creatures that currently exist or have existed in the past on the world the Blight has been installed in. Blightbeast studies are hindered by their dissolution upon death. Instead, they are scanned, observed, and dissected while living by Guild Battlescribes. These employees work in the Intelligence Division, but they must also undergo combat training before entering active duty. Additionally, blightbeasts will die if removed from the location of the festerfont in which they spawned. However, this restriction is eventually removed with the evolution of the Blight.
